sentences.en: It is easier to say that the equivalence of mass and energy is an experimental fact.

sentences.en: Nuclear physics has provided extensive experimental support for the mass - energy equivalence.

sentences.en: The conclusion restates the significance of equivalence theory in advertising translation.

sentences.en: The equivalence check usually includes both functional and structural verifications.

sentences.en: What does the equivalence principle imply about accelerated motions and gravitational fields?

trans.tran_en: If there is equivalence between two things, they have the same use, function, size, or value
